rewardsHeroSubtitle: Earn points and redeem exclusive rewards with every order. The more you order, the more benefits you get!
howToEarnPointsTitle: How can you earn more points?
earnByOrderingDesc: Earn points for every food order from any restaurant (1 point per ST)
earnByRatingDesc: Earn 20 points when you rate restaurants and dishes with a comment
earnByAddingFoodDesc: Earn 50 points for adding homemade dishes or private recipes
earnBySpecialMissionsDesc: Complete weekly missions and seasonal challenges to earn extra points
addFoodCta: Add your food now & earn 50 points
rewardTierGoldBenefit2: Free delivery for orders above 100 ST
enjoyCurrentTierPerks: Enjoy exclusive perks with your current tier
congratsMaxTier: Congratulations! You've reached the highest tier in the rewards program.
